lines.content: h2 Welcome to this RepoSense report!
p The charts on the left show the contribution activities, grouped by repository and author.
| To view the code attributed to a specific author, click the
|   icon next to that author's name.
| To view the breakdown of commits made by a specific author, click the
|   icon next to that author's name.
| To hide the code view and show only the activity charts, click the
|   to get a better understanding of how to interpret the report.
.empty Please upload a .zip file generated by RepoSense.

const c1 = Math.sqrt(labA[1] * labA[1] + labA[2] * labA[2]);
const c2 = Math.sqrt(labB[1] * labB[1] + labB[2] * labB[2]);
let deltaH = deltaA * deltaA + deltaB * deltaB - deltaC * deltaC;
const distance = deltaLKLSL * deltaLKLSL + deltaCKCSC * deltaCKCSC + deltaHKSHS * deltaHKSHS;
const nextMondayDate = this.dateRounding(sinceDate, 0); // round up for the next monday
const endOfWeekMsWithinUntilMs = endOfWeekMs <= untilMs ? endOfWeekMs : untilMs;

.error-message-box__message The following issues occurred when analyzing the following repositories:
span Oops, an unexpected error occurred. If this is due to a problem in RepoSense, please report in
a(v-if="activeFilesCount < this.selectedFiles.length", v-on:click="expandAll()") show all file details
a(v-if="activeFilesCount > 0", v-on:click="collapseAll()") hide all file details
span {{ info.minDate }} to {{ info.maxDate }}    ({{ selectedFiles.length }} files changed)
span.tooltip-text(v-show="file.active") Click to hide file details
span.tooltip-text(v-show="!file.active") Click to show file details
span.tooltip-text Click to view the history view of file
span.tooltip-text Click to view the blame view of file
